summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to and amending Page 24-330 of the Seattle Municipal Code (Plat 40W, Page 110 of the official Zoning Map of The City of Seattle, Ordinance 86300), to rezone certain property located at 1617 Boylston Avenue from the multiple Residence Highest Density Variable Height (RMV 150) Zone to the General Commercial (CG) Zone (Petition of Clement Heath by John Erickson, agent; C.F. 290836).
